DOC.brief_title: Comparison Multifocal Contact Lens Traditional Multifocal Contact Lens
DOC.criteria: Be least 35 year age . Bestcorrected visual acuity least 20/40 eye . Spectacle add +1.50D +2.50D ( inclusive ) . Able fit available study sphere power ( Plano 4.00D ) . Currently wear soft contact lenses least 5 day week . Other protocol inclusion / exclusion criterion may apply . Requires concurrent ocular medication . Eye injury surgery within twelve week immediately prior enrollment . Currently enrol ophthalmic clinical trial . Evidence systemic ocular abnormality , infection disease likely affect successful wear contact lenses use accessory solution . Previous refractive surgery . Astigmatism > 1.00D . Currently wear Proclear Multifocal , Frequency 55 Multifocal Biomedics EP contact lens . Other protocol inclusion / exclusion criterion may apply .
